vendor_name: Cabrits Resort & Spa Kempinski Dominica (partnership ended, now an IHG)
title: Five-Star Kempinski Retreat on Secluded Dominica Island near Cabrits National Park
description: Surrounded by the twin-peaked Cabrits National Park, the five-star Cabrits Resort & Spa Kempinski Dominica encapsulates and preserves the natural beauty of the volcanic island it calls home. A mountainous nation nestled in the turquoise waters of the Caribbean Sea, Dominica is full of picturesque landscapes, cascading waterfalls and the unmissable Boiling Lake, the second largest hot spring in the world. At the resort, you'll find breathtaking views of the surrounding ocean accompanied by four lavish swimming pools, an indulgent spa and a modern fitness centre. When hunger strikes, visit one the four onsite restaurants and bars for casual international bites with views of the sea, beachfront caf√© charm with delicious cocktails or mouthwatering tapas around a cosy fire pit.
offer_address: Bellhall Road, Douglas Bay Cabrits National Park, Portsmouth, Dominica
